alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 11:37AM EST until February 05 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam and Shawneetown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pah. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Mount Vernon. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 34.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 35.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 36.1 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
